about_the_game:
In the mystical hills of Tara, where crystals pulse with power and songs have magic, Luna slept soundly. But when she woke up unexpectedly to see her grandmother’s amulet glowing, little did she know that this was the beginning of an exciting journey and that the fate of the world would rest on her young shoulders…

Journey with Luna and Maven as you make matches, play minigames, solve puzzles, bring light to crystals, and save the twinkly magical world of Tara.

With darkness spreading and the crystal lights fading, can Luna restore harmony to the land before it's too late?

FEATURES

  • MAGICAL MATCH-3 GAMEPLAY: Watch as your matches create clinking crystal cascades and sparkling magical combinations!

  • ENCHANTING STORY: Uncover the secrets of the Crystal Caverns, meet memorable characters, and face off against the mysterious Shadow Seeker!

  • GAMEPLAY VARIETY: Take refreshing breaks from matching with delightful mini-games such as Jigsaws, Find The Differences, Cards, and so on.

  • STUNNING VISUALS: Immerse yourself in a world where every crystal gleams with inner light and magic flows in every match you make.
